comments.content:
Good question. I thought I was trying to express a subculture and the hardcore commitment that qoes with it. But I blew it.  
The mischief-power of graphic design would be better served by adding more fingers. Mutate reality to accommodate language, not the other way around. In the street-cred department, I think the thumbs should be unambiguously outside the fingers.

I reworking this thing, fer sure.
Yep! I'll look at that too, thanks Darrel.
